About.title: Agustin Maurel
About.subtitle: Front-end Developer
About.description: I am a front-end developer with full stack knowledge, but with a lot of inclination and love for front-end. I like to work in a team, share ideas to learn and develop a product that contributes to solve any problem or need of people.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description: Welcome to my portfolio, after 6 years working in commerce in 2020 I decided to venture into this world of programming, going from taking classes to giving them and accompanying students in their study and human process being TA's (teaching assistant). After that I had the privilege to work for start ups from their birth to product conception.
Experience.description2: I most enjoy building software in the sweet spot where design and engineering meet — things that look good but are also built well under the hood.

Card1.title: Front-end Dev MUSURE world
Card1.description: Development of a 3D creation tool focused on helping content creators and gamers to monetize their work, working together with design team, economics, product through SCRUM methodology In charge of the frontend.

Card2.title: Full-Stack Teach-Assistant
Card2.description: Full-Stack teacher assistant, bootcamp assistant for full-stack students. Experience where I had the opportunity to coordinate and integrate study groups, guide and assist in problem solving and promote group work. I was also able to contribute ideas for the improvement of the bootcamp.

Recommendations.title: Recomendaciones
Recommendations.intro: Some testimonials from colleagues or ex-colleagues about my work and their experience together

ref1.title: Tano Bevacqua Cossa
ref1.subtitle: Founder & CEO of MUSURE
ref1.description: Maurel is an amazing team player. A developer that always wanted to have in my team. A problem solver. A lean thinker. A person I really appreciate and I wish to continue work together!. Thanks for everything you did for MUSURE world and let's continue to rock the Metaverse!!

ref2.title: Nico Constantin
ref2.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
ref2.description: It has been a pleasure to work with Agustín in MUSURE world and in other projects we work with.He is a collaborative person, problem-solving and always willing to face new challenges and learn. He also writes code that is easily readable, clean and always with maintainability and scalability in mind.

ref3.title: Fernando Gabriel Villabrille
ref3.subtitle: Diseñador de Producto, Gráfico & Multimedial
ref3.description: He was a valuable team member, possessing expertise and a proactive approach to problem-solving. His teamwork and effective communication with the UX team helped reach our goals.
